Pre-Game Insights: The Dodgers have a 3-0 lead and will clinch with a victory.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dodgers lead the season series 5-1.
The Yankees are 75-14 in games when they have more hits than their opponents.
Others: Luis Gil (15-7, 3.50 ERA, 1.19 WHIP, 171 strikeouts) will pitch for the Yankees.
The teams meet Tuesday for the seventh time this season.
